name: FamousParadoxes
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: famous paradox
des:
A paradox is defined as: " ...a statement that, despite apparently valid reasoning from true premises, leads to an apparently-self-contradictory or logically unacceptable conclusion."

Paradoxes always fascinated and puzzled people. In this skill, you can explore dozens of famous handpicked paradoxes from fields such as:

- Logic
- Mathematics
- Science
- Philosophy
- Physics
- Biology
- Time Travel
- And more!

Amuse yourself and learn something new with "Famous Paradoxes"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
